name: Drunk and Punk
description:
Submission to Hardcore Punk Jam 3: 
https://itch.io/jam/hardcore-punk-jam-3

Fardin Fahim

Martin Tsvetkov

Konstantin Mishtalov

PLAYER GUIDE

CONTROLS

W -  accelerate (there is no drag!!)

S - decelerate

A/D - rotate right/left

SPACE - jump

You goal is to get so drunk that you puke on Evil Corp's headquarters.

For every beer you drink your drunk level increases and your controls worsen. Crash into walls at a high velocity to sober up (that's how it works, right?)

Drink two beers to become Nauseated. Reach Evil Corp before you puke and have to restart!

Drinking three beers makes you blackout. (No? Just me?)

Use slippery puddles (orange circles) to give yourself a speed boost.
